home.heroText: Gattabara Games is a Software design and development company headquartered in Bangalore.

curatedPartnerships.description: Gattabara Games partners selectively with teams worldwide to design and build distinctive software products—combining strong technical execution with thoughtful product design. Every engagement is held to rigorous standards, with client satisfaction as the baseline.

introText: Gattabara Games is an AI-powered game studio built for bold worlds and ambitious founders. We don’t just ship products — we co-create universes. Through deep collaboration with visionary teams, we share ownership, shape strategy, and build alongside you from concept to scale. We operate independently, move fast, and fuse AI with design to craft experiences that are immersive, scalable, and commercially dominant.

We’ve spent serious time defining what we stand for. Our values aren’t filler — they guide every mechanic we design, every system we architect, and every decision we make. We evolve constantly, but these principles are our core engine.

values.title: Curiosity, creativity and intellectual agility
values.description: Original thinking and collaboration are at the core of the organization. Strong voices and unique ideas are valued in everything we do.

values.title: Savoir Faire
values.description: We celebrate people who take pride in their craft, giving them the space to improve, the resources to flourish, and opportunities to share their expertise.

values.title: Supporting and elevating each other
values.description: We nurture a vibrant, inclusive community where people feel safe, respected and empowered.
